changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.manual ( product_id int8 NOT NULL, material_id int8 NOT NULL, quantity int4 DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT manual_materials_fk FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES public.materials(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT manual_products_fk FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES public.products(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE );
